==== A bit about myself ====
My name is Robin van Leeuwen, born june 27th 1980 in the Netherlands. I used Ubuntu from version 6.10 and other flavours of Linux since 1997 notably Slackware and Debian. I joined the Ubuntu community recently to actively give back to the community.

I have a degree in Business & Computer Science and worked as system administrator and freelance ICT consultant.
